# IFineTuneService.CancelFineTuneAsync method

Immediately cancel a fine-tune job.

```csharp
public Task<CancelFineTuneResponse> CancelFineTuneAsync(string fineTuneId)
```

CancelFineTuneResponse

## Remarks

POST https://api.openai.com/v1/fine-tunes/{fine_tune_id}/cancel
